Writer: Steve Oedekerk (screenplay), Steve Oedekerk (story), Joel Cohen (story), Alec Sokolow (story), Steve Koren (characters), Mark O'Keefe (characters)
Title: Evan Almighty
Plot: God contacts Congressman Evan Baxter and tells him to build an ark in preparation for a great flood.
Actors: Steve Carell, Morgan Freeman, Lauren Graham, Johnny Simmons
